text: This is a list of governors for Norrbotten County of Sweden. Norrbotten County separated from Västerbotten County in 1810; for a list of governors who ruled the area before that date, see List of governors of Västerbotten County. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !Picture!!Governor!!Took office!!Left office |- style="height:2em;" |75px |Per Adolph Ekorn |1810 |1816 |- |75px |Gustaf Adolph Koskull |1816 |1821 |- |75px |Paul Öhrvall |1821 |1825 |- |75px |Carl Georg Sparre |1825 |1836 |- |75px |Carl August von Hedenberg |1836 |1849 |- |75px |Hans Samuel Knut Åkerhielm |1849 |1856 |- |75px |Axel Emanuel Ros |1856 |1859 |- |75px |Per Henrik Widmark |1859 |1861 |- |75px |Sven Peter Bergman |1861 |1873 |- |75px |Henrik Adolf Widmark |1873 |1885 |- |75px |Lars Berg |1885 |1893 |- |75px |Karl Sigfrid Husberg |1893 |1900 |- |75px |Karl Johan Bergström |1900 |1911 |- |75px |Oscar von Sydow |1911 |1917 |- |75px |Carl Gösta Oskar Malm |1917 |1928 |- |75px |August Bernhard Gärde |1928 |1937 |- |75px |David Hansén |1937 |1947 |- |75px |Oskar Wilhelm Lövgren |1947 |1952 |- |75px |Folke Tunborg |1953 |1957 |- |75px |Manfred Näslund |1957 |1966 |- |75px |Ragnar Lassinantti |1966 |1982 |- |75px |Erik Hammarsten |1982 |1985 |- |75px |Curt Boström |1985 |1991 |- |75px |Gunnar Brodin |1992 |1995 |- |75px |Björn Rosengren |1996 |1998 |- |75px |Kari Marklund |1 January 1999 |31 July 2003 |- |75px |Per-Ola Eriksson |1 August 2003 |31 July 2012 |- |75px |Sven-Erik Österberg |1 October 2012 |31 January 2018 |- |75px |Johan Antti |1 February 2018 |31 May 2018 |- |75px |Björn O.
